languages.text: “不过，所有的一切都迟早会结束，亲爱的。那个女孩已经长大了，和{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}打成了一片。她攒了一点点钱，甚至可以时不时地放纵一番……然而，这样的好日子差点要了她的命。政务部和军务部的人进行了内部调查，她的老主顾都被抓走了，而她也差点掉了脑袋。”
languages.original_text: "But everything in this world ends sooner or later, shereen. The now not-so-little girl went and fell in with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, she saved up a little gold, and she even indulged in excess from time to time... Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum."

traits.locale_text: “不过，所有的一切都迟早会结束，亲爱的。那个女孩已经长大了，和{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}打成了一片。她攒了一点点钱，甚至可以时不时地放纵一番……然而，这样的好日子差点要了她的命。政务部和军务部的人进行了内部调查，她的老主顾都被抓走了，而她也差点掉了脑袋。”

languages.text: "But everything in this world ends sooner or later, shereen. The now not-so-little girl went and fell in with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, she saved up a little gold, and she even indulged in excess from time to time... Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum."
languages.original_text: "Но всему в этом мире есть предел, шерин. И уже-совсем-не-девочка окрепла, связалась с {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбалликой{/g}, накопила себе порядком золотишка и даже почти регулярно баловалась излишествами... Пока однажды чуть не поплатилась за хорошую жизнь головой, когда покровители девочки попали под внутреннее расследование Оффицио Префектум и Департменто Муниторум".

traits.locale_text: "But everything in this world ends sooner or later, shereen. The now not-so-little girl went and fell in with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, she saved up a little gold, and she even indulged in excess from time to time... Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departamento Munitorum."

"But everything in this world ends sooner or later, shereen. The now not-so-little girl went and fell in with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, she saved up a little gold, and she even indulged in excess from time to time... Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departamento Munitorum."

Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departamento Munitorum."

"But everything in this world ends sooner or later, shereen. The now not-so-little girl went and fell in with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, she saved up a little gold, and she even indulged in excess from time to time... Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departamento Munitorum."

"But everything in this world ends sooner or later, shereen. The now not-so-little girl went and fell in with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, she saved up a little gold, and she even indulged in excess from time to time... Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departamento Munitorum."

languages.text: "Но всему в этом мире есть предел, шерин. И уже-совсем-не-девочка окрепла, связалась с {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбалликой{/g}, накопила себе порядком золотишка и даже почти регулярно баловалась излишествами... Пока однажды чуть не поплатилась за хорошую жизнь головой, когда покровители девочки попали под внутреннее расследование Оффицио Префектум и Департменто Муниторум".

«Pero todo en este mundo acaba tarde o temprano, shereen. La niña ya no tan pequeña se metió a la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, ahorró un poco de dinero, disfrutó de los excesos de vez en cuando... hasta que vivir la buena vida casi le costó la cabeza a la niña cuando sus patrones se vieron involucrados en una investigación interna entre el Officio Prefectus y el Departmento Munitorum».
languages.original_text: "But everything in this world ends sooner or later, shereen. The now not-so-little girl went and fell in with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, she saved up a little gold, and she even indulged in excess from time to time... Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum."

traits.locale_text: «Pero todo en este mundo acaba tarde o temprano, shereen. La niña ya no tan pequeña se metió a la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, ahorró un poco de dinero, disfrutó de los excesos de vez en cuando... hasta que vivir la buena vida casi le costó la cabeza a la niña cuando sus patrones se vieron involucrados en una investigación interna entre el Officio Prefectus y el Departmento Munitorum».

languages.text: 「でも、この世のすべてのことは遅かれ早かれ終わるんだ、シェリーン。かつての少女は、{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}に入りこみ、少しずつ金を貯め、時折、贅沢をした…でも、彼女のパトロンたちが帝国管理局と帝国兵務局の内部調査に巻き込まれたことで、その少女の首は危うく飛ぶところだったんだ」
languages.original_text: "But everything in this world ends sooner or later, shereen. The now not-so-little girl went and fell in with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, she saved up a little gold, and she even indulged in excess from time to time... Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum."

traits.locale_text: 「でも、この世のすべてのことは遅かれ早かれ終わるんだ、シェリーン。かつての少女は、{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}に入りこみ、少しずつ金を貯め、時折、贅沢をした…でも、彼女のパトロンたちが帝国管理局と帝国兵務局の内部調査に巻き込まれたことで、その少女の首は危うく飛ぶところだったんだ」

languages.text: « Mais rien n'est éternel, shereen. En fricotant avec la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, la fillette, qui n'était plus si petite, a certes pu cumuler un beau petit pactole et s'adonner à quelques excès... mais elle a aussi manqué y laisser sa tête quand ses bienfaiteurs se sont retrouvés au cœur d'une enquête interne conjointe de l'Officio Prefectus et du Departmento Munitorum. »
languages.original_text: "But everything in this world ends sooner or later, shereen. The now not-so-little girl went and fell in with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, she saved up a little gold, and she even indulged in excess from time to time... Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum."

traits.locale_text: « Mais rien n'est éternel, shereen. En fricotant avec la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, la fillette, qui n'était plus si petite, a certes pu cumuler un beau petit pactole et s'adonner à quelques excès... mais elle a aussi manqué y laisser sa tête quand ses bienfaiteurs se sont retrouvés au cœur d'une enquête interne conjointe de l'Officio Prefectus et du Departamento Munitorum. »

languages.text: "Doch alles in dieser Welt endet früher oder später, Shereen. Das nun nicht mehr so kleine Mädchen ließ sich mit der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} ein, sparte ein wenig Gold und erging sich gelegentlich sogar in dem einen oder anderen kleinen Exzess ... Bis dieses schöne Leben das kleine Mädchen fast den Kopf gekostet hätte, nachdem seine Kunden in eine interne Untersuchung zwischen dem Officio Prefectus und dem Departmento Munitorum verwickelt wurden."
languages.original_text: "But everything in this world ends sooner or later, shereen. The now not-so-little girl went and fell in with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, she saved up a little gold, and she even indulged in excess from time to time... Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum."

traits.locale_text: "Doch alles in dieser Welt endet früher oder später, Shereen. Das nun nicht mehr so kleine Mädchen ließ sich mit der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} ein, sparte ein wenig Gold und erging sich gelegentlich sogar in dem einen oder anderen kleinen Exzess ... Bis dieses schöne Leben das kleine Mädchen fast den Kopf gekostet hätte, nachdem seine Kunden in eine interne Untersuchung zwischen dem Officio Prefectus und dem Departamento Munitorm verwickelt wurden."

languages.original_text: "But everything in this world ends sooner or later, shereen. The now not-so-little girl went and fell in with the Kasballica, she saved up a little gold, and she even indulged in excess from time to time... Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departamento Munitorum."

languages.text: "Bu dünyada her şey er ya da geç sona erer ama şirinim. Artık o kadar da küçük olmayan kız gidip {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica'ya{/g} karışmış, biraz altın biriktirmiş, hatta zaman zaman bazı aşırılıklarda bulunmuş. Ta ki bu yaşadığı güzel hayat ona neredeyse kellesine mal olana kadar. Officio Prefektus ve Departamento Munitorum, kendi bünyelerinde yaptıkları incelemenin ardından kızın ne haltlar yediğini öğrenmişler."
languages.original_text: "But everything in this world ends sooner or later, shereen. The now not-so-little girl went and fell in with the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, she saved up a little gold, and she even indulged in excess from time to time... Until living the good life almost cost the little girl her head after her patrons got caught in an internal investigation between the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum."

traits.locale_text: "Bu dünyada her şey er ya da geç sona erer ama şirinim. Artık o kadar da küçük olmayan kız gidip {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}'ya karışmış, biraz altın biriktirmiş, hatta zaman zaman bazı aşırılıklarda bulunmuş. Ta ki bu yaşadığı güzel hayat ona neredeyse kellesine mâl olana kadar. Officio Prefectus ve Departamento Munitorum, kendi bünyelerinde yaptıkları incelemenin ardından kızın ne haltlar yediğini öğrenmişler."
